params._operation: The operation of the tranfser(Merge / Transfer)
params._tokenId: The token is about to transfer

params._rwaValue: The RWA value priced by USDC

params._sourceId: The token is about to be merged
params._targetId: The token is about to merge

params._sourceIds: The tokens are about to be merged
params._targetId: The token is about to merge

params._value: The value that minter is desired to mint

params._tokenId: The token is about to redeem

params._tokenIds: The tokens are about to redeem

params._tokenId: The token is about to split
params._value: The value is splitted into new token

params._tokenId: The token is about to split
params._values: The values are splitted into new tokens

beforeTransfer(uint256,uint8).notice: this function will be triggered when the token or value of    ERC-3525 is transfered, it will claim the interest

createSlot(string,string,uint256).notice: Create a slot and save the asset data

getTokensByOwner(address).notice: Get all tokens owned by the owner

merge(uint256,uint256).notice: Merge two tokens into one token

merge(uint256[],uint256).notice: Merge multiple tokens into one token

mint(uint256).notice: Mint a ERC-3525 NFT for the given slot with value

reset().notice: Slot owner resets all slot data and token data

split(uint256,uint256).notice: Split one token to two tokens

split(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Split one token to multiple tokens

documentation.text: @notice Slot owner resets all slot data and token data

@notice Mint a ERC-3525 NFT for the given slot with value
 @param _value The value that minter is desired to mint

@notice Redeem one token
 @param _tokenId The token is about to redeem

@notice Redeem multiple tokens at once
 @param _tokenIds The tokens are about to redeem
